description:
This course is designed specifically for startups interested in using marketing automation. Mautic helps startups create landing pages to collect interested users, enroll users in a beta program, communicate through email and social media with those users, and collected valuable feedback which will ultimately be used to improve their product.

We understand startups have limited time. The entire idea behind marketing automation is to make life easy by automating as much of the marketing and engagement process as possible. We made this course short and sweet. Videos are approximately 5 minutes each and show clear step-by-step instructions for every step.

You should take this course to learn how to implement a strong email list of potential users, run a successful beta program, and collect feedback on improving the product - all done automatically and with minimal effort.
title: Marketing Automation for Startups
